Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Blackstone
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/Blackstone.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/Blackstone.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lake Shore Dr/Belmont
ShortDescription: Northbound 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Fullerton, and Cannon Drive near Lake Shore Dr/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Fullerton, and Cannon Drive due to, construction near Lake Shore Dr/Belmont.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/Belmont
ShortDescription: NB 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temp. rrted via Lake Shore Drive, Fullerton, Cannon Dr., Addison, & Lake Shore Dr. nr Lake Shore Dr/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Fullerton, Cannon Drive, Addison, and Lake Shore Drive near Lake Shore Drive/Belmont.

Southbound buses are not affected.
